data.title: David Dhawan: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: David Dhawan: Check out the list of all David Dhawan movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest David Dhawan news on Times of India.
data.text:
Ranvir Shorey shares his casting experience with David Dhawan for Govinda starrer 'Do Knot Disturb': "I was a dead body for almost 90 percent of the film"

etimes.in / Aug 14, 2024, 07:31 (IST)

Flattered by Dhawan's praise, Shorey agreed to sign the film, which was a comeback project for the director-actor duo of Dhawan and Govinda. However, Shorey's excitement soon turned to surprise when he learned about the nature of his role. "He then told me to do his next film called Do Knot Disturb, starring Govinda"

Ganesh Acharya recalls Govinda and David Dhawan giving him a major break with Husn Hai Suhana: 'Saroj Khan and Chinni Prakash were top choreographers but...'

etimes.in / Aug 13, 2024, 22:50 (IST)

In the 1990s, Govinda was celebrated for his comic flair and dance moves, but few know that choreographer Ganesh Acharya played a key role behind many of his hit songs. In a recent interview, Ganesh shared the story of how he landed his first major break with Govinda and director David Dhawan, leading to the iconic track Husn Hai Suhana from Coolie No 1.

David Dhawan takes a dig at OTT actors and releases with a fiery remark: 'Theater aao aur aukaat dikhao'

etimes.in / Aug 10, 2024, 18:38 (IST)

David Dhawan, known for directing over 40 films, has become more selective, with his last release over four years ago. In a recent chat, he defended the irreplaceable magic of theatrical experiences over OTT platforms. His upcoming project with Varun Dhawan, rumored to be titled Hai Jawani Toh Ishq Hona Hai, is set for October 2025, though no official announcement has been made.

David Dhawan discloses Salman Khan's hesitance to work with Govinda in 'Partner'

etimes.in / Jul 30, 2024, 17:18 (IST)

In the 1990s, director David Dhawan and actor Govinda enjoyed a highly successful partnership, working on nearly 17 films, most of which were major hits. David recently reflected on their collaboration, noting that he was uniquely skilled at managing Govinda, despite his habitual lateness, with all work always completed on time. David praised Govinda as the "king of improvisation" and shared their unique on-set communication, where David would describe a scene as "rubber hai" and Govinda would offer to complete it in one shot. David also discussed the challenges of casting Salman Khan and Govinda in Partner, revealing Salman’s initial reluctance, which David overcame by convincing him it would be a significant project. Additionally, David recalled working with Anil Kapoor and Govinda in Deewana Mastana, describing Anil as hardworking and Govinda as "like butter," while noting Anil's occasional frustration over their frequent collaborations.

Has Telugu star Sreeleela opted out of David Dhawan's film starring Varun Dhawan? Producer Ramesh Taurani responds - Exclusive

etimes.in / Jul 31, 2024, 02:24 (IST)

There were speculations that Telugu actress Sreeleela might no longer be part of the upcoming David Dhawan directorial film produced by Tips Films. When contacted for confirmation, producer Ramesh Taurani told ETimes, "We were just considering her for the role." He added that a replacement has not yet been found.

David Dhawan reveals Varun Dhawan was upset with Sidharth Malhotra during 'Student of the Year'

etimes.in / Jul 30, 2024, 17:21 (IST)

David Dhawan revealed that he intentionally took a strict approach with his son, Varun Dhawan, during their first collaboration. Varun, introduced to the film industry by Karan Johar and familiar with a specific working style from his time assisting Karan on My Name is Khan, was initially considered by David and his wife, Lalli, for a potential bank career. David recalled asking Varun what he wanted to do after studying abroad, with Lalli suggesting a banking job due to its popularity. Varun surprised them by expressing a desire to assist Karan Johar, leading to his eventual hiring for My Name is Khan, thanks to a recommendation from cameraman Ravi Chandran. In a chat with Arbaaz Khan on The Invincibles Series, David shared that Karan Johar wanted to launch Varun, leading to a photoshoot with Sidharth Malhotra. Despite Varun's occasional frustration, David encouraged him, praising his confidence and urging him to embrace the opportunity. David has since cast Varun in his last three films: Main Tera Hero, Judwaa 2, and Coolie No. 1, though they received mixed reviews.

Priyanka Chopra celebrates 20 years of 'Mujhse Shaadi Karogi' with throwback pictures, says, "Those brows tho..."

etimes.in / Jul 30, 2024, 13:26 (IST)

The actress captioned her post, "20 years of being Rani! Woah! Those brows tho", accompanied by laughing and crying emojis. She also made sure to use the iconic song 'Mujhse Shaadi Karogi' in her story, which was sung by Sonu Nigam, Sunidhi Chauhan, and Udit Narayan. Directed by David Dhawan, the film starred Salman Khan, Akshay Kumar, and Priyanka Chopra in the lead roles, with a supporting cast that included Amrish Puri, Kader Khan, Satish Shah, and Rajpal Yadav.

Newbie parents Varun Dhawan and Natasha Dalal step out for a movie date

etimes.in / Jul 24, 2024, 11:36 (IST)

​In a recent encounter with the paparazzi, Varun had expressed his happiness regarding his daughter's arrival while hinting at upcoming work. Varun recently sustained a rib injury while filming an untitled project directed by his father, David Dhawan. Apart from this, Varun is also gearing up for his upcoming action thriller, Baby John, which marks the Hindi film debut of South Indian actress Keerthy Suresh.

When Govinda declined to work with Sushmita Sen in 'Biwi No 1' before Salman Khan joined the film

etimes.in / Jul 22, 2024, 15:16 (IST)

​Govinda was initially considered for the film directed by David Dhawan. However, the role eventually went to Salman Khan after Govinda declined the project reportedly due to reservations about working with Sushmita Sen. David Dhawan originally wanted Govinda to play the role of a husband who cheats in the movie. Govinda agreed to do the film but didn't want to work alongside Sushmita Sen

Varun Dhawan to begin shooting David Dhawan's romantic comedy in Mumbai on July 12

etimes.in / Jul 09, 2024, 14:18 (IST)

Varun Dhawan is gearing up for his fourth collaboration with filmmaker-father, David Dhawan for an upcoming project which will mark a new chapter in their successful partnership, known for delivering side-splitting laughter. This time, they're changing course and entering the world of romantic comedy. While specifics about the plot remain undisclosed, recent reports indicate that Mrunal Thakur will star as the leading lady alongside Varun Dhawan.
